definition: Washington (name)/George Washington (1732-1799), first US president/Washington, US State/Washington, D.C. (US federal capital)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: Were you aware he was ball-deep in some Washington wonk ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道他和華盛頓的一個書呆子有染嗎？

sentences.english: Lobbyists in Washington have been delighted by all this new activity.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓的遊說團體對於這些新活動一直欣喜不已。

sentences.english: It happened to be in the Washington, D.C., suburbs, near my home.
sentences.chinese: 店址選在首都華盛頓市郊，恰在我家附近。

sentences.english: Washington's backing allowed the airlines to expand into cargo and passenger service.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓的支持讓航空公司拓展到貨物和旅客的服務。

sentences.english: Passengers had rebelled against the hijackers, who had turned the plane toward Washington.
sentences.chinese: 劫機者將飛機掉頭飛往華盛頓，乘客們奮起反抗。

sentences.english: His reputation may even have been enhanced among opponents of Washington's heavy-handed foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲甚至在反對華盛頓鐵腕政策中的人中名聲鵲起。

sentences.english: Stay tuned to this channel for the latest news from Washington.
sentences.chinese: 繼續收聽這個臺以關注來自華盛頓的最新消息。

sentences.english: Even so, many activists say they are packing their bags and heading to Washington.
sentences.chinese: 即便這樣，許多倡導者說他們要收拾行裝上華盛頓。

sentences.english: But anti-China rhetoric is hot in Washington and among many state and local officials.
sentences.chinese: 反中國的言論在華盛頓各級官員中間此起彼伏。

sentences.english: When Washington ordered troops into the area, the opposition collapsed without a fight.
sentences.chinese: 在華盛頓下令軍隊開進該地區時，抗爭者不戰而散。

sentences.english: I, unfortunately, will be going back to Washington after my remarks. Secretary Rod Paige and the Lt.
sentences.chinese: 非常抱歉，在講話結束之後，我將回到華盛頓。

sentences.english: The American carrier George Washington was slated to participate in the drill.
sentences.chinese: 美國的華盛頓號航母被派遣參與這次演習。

sentences.english: The first U. S. Prisident George Washington is on the dollar bill.
sentences.chinese: 首任美國總統喬治華盛頓的像在一元美鈔上。

sentences.english: This is a huge, huge deal in Washington and it is a high-priority discussion.
sentences.chinese: 這是華盛頓的一件大事，必須優先考慮。

sentences.english: You sent us to Washington to do the tough things.
sentences.chinese: 你們選擇我們到華盛頓來解決難事，做正事。
